cells.data: -- takeWhileR :: (a -> Bool) -> [a] -> [a]on takeWhileR(p, xs)	set bln to false	tell mReturn(p)		set lng to length of xs		repeat with i from lng to 1 by -1			if not |Î»|(item i of xs) then				set bln to true				exit repeat			end if		end repeat	end tell	if bln then		if i > 1 then			items (1 + i) thru (-1) of xs		else			{}		end if	else		xs	end ifend takeWhileR
